channel.title: Set up VPN server on Whonix-gateway
channel.description: I have win 7 VM and i want to connec to whonix gateway WM with VPN. So no traffic sends before win 7 workstation is connected to Whonix gateway via VPN. Is this possible? Thank you.

item.title: Set up VPN server on Whonix-gateway
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
For VPN in Whonix-Gateway

User -> VPN -> Tor -> Internet

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tunnels/Connecting_to_a_VPN_before_Tor#Inside_Whonix-Gateway

Read full topic
item.source: Set up VPN server on Whonix-gateway

item.title: Set up VPN server on Whonix-gateway
item.dc:creator: squarebob
item.description:
I am setting UP Vpn server on whonix gateway so I connect to gateway itself from workstation (win7) through VPN. And on Whonix gateway I’am setting up vpn client to connect to VPN server. I think that makes things clearer.

Read full topic
item.source: Set up VPN server on Whonix-gateway

item.title: Set up VPN server on Whonix-gateway
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi squarebob

I’m not sure what you’re asking.

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tunnels/Connecting_to_a_VPN_before_Tor#Terminology_for_Support_Requests

Are you asking how to:

User -> Vpn -> Tor -> VPN -> Internet

BTW You’ re setting up VPN clients not servers.

Read full topic
item.source: Set up VPN server on Whonix-gateway

item.title: Set up VPN server on Whonix-gateway
item.dc:creator: squarebob
item.description:
I want to build that kind of scheme workstation->VPN->whonix gateway->tor->VPN. To get the last part working i just need to launch vpn client on whonix and thats it?

Read full topic
item.source: Set up VPN server on Whonix-gateway

item.title: Set up VPN server on Whonix-gateway
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Yes, possible. However, documentation is not complete.

https://whonix.org/wiki/Connections_between_Whonix-Gateway_and_Whonix-Workstation

Should also read:

https://whonix.org/wiki/Tunnels

Read full topic
item.source: Set up VPN server on Whonix-gateway
